contactPage.title: Contact with us!
contactPage.text1: If you have an interesting <1>idea</1> that could help improve our platform, reach out to us! <1>Experiencing issues</1> on the site? We‚Äôre here to help. Contact us, and we‚Äôll do our best to resolve the problem as quickly as possible.

cooperationPage.title: Contact with us!
cooperationPage.text1: Would you like to <1>promote</1> your company or product on our platform? Or maybe you have an idea on how we can <1>develop</1> our site together and create new, innovative solutions? We are also open to <1>collaborating with patrons</1> who would like to support our activities and become part of our growth. Reach out to us, and let's discuss opportunities for collaboration!

newsPage.title: Football News
newsPage.text1: Stay updated with the latest <1>football events</1> and news from around the world. Get information about upcoming tournaments, matches, and exciting developments in the football community.

initialNews.title: Welcome to Futbolovo News!
initialNews.content: Welcome to Futbolovo News! This is where you'll find all the latest updates about <1>football events</1>, tournament announcements, and platform updates. Stay tuned for exciting news from the football community!

excMobileOchotaSoccaChampions2025.title: EXC Mobile Ochota wins Socca Champions League!
excMobileOchotaSoccaChampions2025.content: Polish side EXC Mobile Ochota captured the Socca Champions League title on Crete. In the final Krystian Nowakowski scored twice ‚Äî including a stunning lob from his own half ‚Äî and was named tournament MVP. It's Ochota's third trophy this year (Polish championship and Liga Fan√≥w Cup). The tournament featured 106 teams, 15 of them from Poland.

sopotFreestyleChampionship2025.title: Freestyle Football World Championship in Sopot
sopotFreestyleChampionship2025.content: In approximately 3 months, on December 13, the Freestyle Football World Championship final will take place at ERGO ARENA. This spectacular discipline returns to the city, having been hosted here last year during the WFFA Pulse European Championship. This time, we will see the best male and female athletes from around the world on the Sopot stage.

polishChampions.title: Poland Wins European 6-a-side Football Championship!
polishChampions.content:
The Polish national team became the European Champion in 6-a-side football! In the grand final played on June 8, 2025, in Chisinau (Moldova), the <1>White and Red</1> defeated the French 4:2. <2>Norbert Jaszczak</2> was the key player - scoring two goals, including the decisive one that sealed the victory. This is Poland's first European title in the history of Polish sixes - until now, Poland only won medals at world cups (silver in 2018, 2019, and bronze in 2022).

The team consisting of Krystian Nowakowski, Bart≈Çomiej Dƒôbicki, Norbert Jaszczak and others impressed with their effectiveness throughout the tournament. On their way to the championship, they eliminated Lithuania, Moldova, and Croatia, before adding another five goals in the final (after drawing with France 4:2).

This is a historic achievement for Polish sixes - congratulations on the first European championship!

marchUpdate.title: Platform Update: Enhanced Image Management
marchUpdate.content:
We are pleased to announce recent improvements to our platform <1>enhancing your user experience:

‚Ä¢ Enhanced image handling - now you can add up to 3 images per event.

‚Ä¢ Added image preview functionality in edit mode for better management.

‚Ä¢ Improved image organization system for more effective content management.

‚Ä¢ Streamlined image upload process for better user experience.

These updates are designed to make your experience on Futbolovo more intuitive and efficient. We're continuously working to improve our platform based on your feedback!

soccaEternisCup2025.title: Socca Eternis Cup 2025 goes down in history!
soccaEternisCup2025.content:
68 teams, incredible emotions, a great level of play, and in the end the best turned out to be <1>FC ≈Åowcy, who conceded only‚Ä¶ one goal throughout the tournament! Unbelievable! ü§Ø

warsawOldboyLeague2025.title: Warsaw Oldboy League: New Season Begins!
warsawOldboyLeague2025.content: The new season of the Warsaw Oldboy League kicks off on September 1, 2025! Both the first and second leagues are now active. We wish all teams good luck and a fantastic season!

servicesPage.title: Football Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Discover a wide range of <1>football services</1> to enhance your game.
servicesPage.servicesWillAppear: Services will appear here once they are added to the system

training.title: Personal Training
training.description: Individual training sessions with experienced coaches to help you develop technical, tactical, and physical skills. Training tailored to your skill level and sports goals. Professional coaching covering technique work, fitness, and mental preparation for the game.

coaching.title: Coaching & Consulting
coaching.description: Professional sports consulting and mental coaching for football players at every level. Assistance with career planning, developing leadership skills, and psychological preparation for matches. Group and individual sessions with certified specialists in sports psychology.

equipment.title: Football Equipment
equipment.description: Wide selection of professional football equipment - from shoes and kits to training accessories. We offer products from the best sports brands, ensuring comfort and high quality. Consultation in choosing the right equipment for your needs and level of play.

fieldRental.title: Field Rental
fieldRental.description: Reservation of football fields by the hour, day, or longer periods. Available grass, synthetic fields, and sports halls. Ideal solution for amateur teams, group training, or friendly matches. Flexible opening hours and competitive prices.

events.title: Event Organization
events.description: Comprehensive organization of football tournaments, sports camps, and football events. We handle logistics, facility booking, refereeing, and event promotion. Ideal for clubs, schools, and organizations wanting to organize professional football events.

nutrition.title: Sports Nutrition
nutrition.description: Individual nutrition plans developed by experienced sports dietitians. Professional advice on supplementation and recovery. Help in optimizing diet for maximum performance and faster recovery after training and matches.

physiotherapy.title: Sports Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.description: Specialist physiotherapy care for football players - injury prevention, rehabilitation, and manual therapy. Professional sports massages, recovery exercises, and injury prevention programs. Comprehensive medical care for players at every level.

videoAnalysis.title: Video Analysis
videoAnalysis.description: Professional video analysis of your matches and training sessions using modern analytical tools. Detailed reports on your game, improvement tips, and comparisons with professional players. Ideal for ambitious players looking to elevate their game.

rangeDisabledInfo: Applies to camps, matches or tournaments categories.

addPlace.title: Want to make your mark on the map?
addPlace.text1: Add your field, organize a tournament, offer your services, or create a football camp! Share a place that awaits athletes and teams from all around. Promote your offer,
addPlace.text2: get noticed, and attract new participants!

statutePage.title: Terms and Conditions
statutePage.responsibilityText: Each user who posts an advertisement is fully responsible for the content posted. Advertisements must comply with applicable law and must not infringe the rights of third parties.
statutePage.dataUsageText: It is forbidden to use other people's personal data, including names, email addresses, or phone numbers, without the consent of their owners. It is also prohibited to use other people's trademarks, including logos, without proper authorization.
statutePage.accurateInfoText: The advertiser is obliged to provide accurate and truthful information in the advertisement. Any discrepancy or misleading information may result in the removal of the advertisement.
statutePage.logoUsageTitle: Prohibition of Using Futbolovo's Logo and Solutions
statutePage.logoUsageText: It is forbidden to use the logo, names, graphics, and any technological solutions used on the Futbolovo website without the consent of the administrators.
statutePage.illegalContentText: It is forbidden to add content that violates copyrights, personal rights, netiquette rules, or promotes illegal activities.
statutePage.dataVerificationText: Platform administrators may require verification of users' and advertisers' contact details.
statutePage.complaintsText: The administrator has the right to remove an advertisement that does not meet the requirements of the regulations or is reported as violating the law.
statutePage.changesText: Administrators reserve the right to change the regulations at any time. Users will be informed about the changes made.
statutePage.contactText: All questions and complaints regarding advertisements should be directed to the platform's contact address

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.adminText: The personal data administrator is Piotr Myszkiewicz, located at Warsaw Radziwie 3/2. Contact with the administrator is possible via email:
privacyPolicyPage.dataScopeText: We collect personal data such as name, surname, email address, phone number, IP, as well as data related to activity on the site, including data related to advertisements added by users.
privacyPolicyPage.dataPurposeText: Personal data is processed for the purpose of providing services offered on the platform, contacting users, handling advertisements, as well as for analytical and marketing purposes.
privacyPolicyPage.dataSharingText: Personal data is not shared with third parties unless it is necessary to perform the contract or required by law.
privacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityText: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data, including data encryption and access limited to authorized employees.
privacyPolicyPage.userRightsText: Users have the right to access their personal data, correct it, delete it, restrict processing, transfer data, and object to its processing.
privacyPolicyPage.dataRetentionText: Personal data will be stored for the period necessary to achieve the purposes indicated above, after which it will be deleted or anonymized.
privacyPolicyPage.policyChangesText: The administrator reserves the right to change the privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this page.
privacyPolicyPage.contactText: For matters related to personal data, please contact:

acceptTermsAndPrivacyLabel: I accept the <1>Terms and Conditions</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>
